verses.name: Zechariah 4:4
verses.text: So I answered and spake to the angel that talked with me, saying, What are these, my lord?

verses.name: Zechariah 4:5
verses.text: Then the angel that talked with me answered and said unto me, Knowest thou not what these be? And I said, No, my lord.

verses.name: Zechariah 4:6
verses.text: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.
